overview: Cursed with the gift of beauty and fame, Julie finds she is unable to meet a man who can look beyond her famous face and love her for who she is, not what she looks like. Tire of meaningless physical encounters, she's ready to give up. Until she meets Roy a handsome blind man who is attracted to her for all the right reasons and who is ironically, the only man who can see deep inside her soul.
title: Blind Date
